description: This file defines a utility function 'withRetry' that implements an exponential backoff retry mechanism for handling transient errors in asynchronous functions. It exports the 'withRetry' function both named and as a default export.

methods.name: withRetry(fn, { retries = 3, factor = 2, minTimeout = 300, maxTimeout = 3000 } = {})
methods.description: An asynchronous function that wraps another function with retry logic using exponential backoff.

ctags.name: withRetry
ctags.pattern: /^export async function withRetry(fn, { retries = 3, factor = 2, minTimeout = 300, maxTimeout = 30/
